page.title: 13Tibberton Institute
page.content: The Church Institute is a church hall. It belongs to the{Church of {England.} It is about 50 feet by 25 feet and about{60 years old. {It is used}by the Brownies, youth club, keep fit, private parties,jumble sales, Womens Institute and many more. {A new kitchen and toilets }were built when the institute was extended in l98l. The institute is{financed}by fund- raising events and by charges made to users. There are{90 chairs and l2 tables in the institute. There is an{electric {cooker}in the kitchen. The hall also has{electric central heating. You book the institute through the booking secretary. It costs about Â£3 an hour.
